short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays SEO information in side panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Sidebar Extension delivers comprehensive on-page SEO insights as you browse the web. Once activated, the sidebar remains visible and continuously updates with key SEO information for each page you visit, Which allowing you to assess website seo information in real time.

The extension provides in-depth details on:

- Meta Tags
- Header Tags
- Canonical URLs
- Internal and External Links
- Image Alt Attributes
- Schema Markup
- Open Graph (OG) Tags (Facebook, Twitter, Article)


You can also easily export the collected data as a text report for further analysis or documentation.
